name: Ryuvian Afterburners
tags: special, engines, offensive, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, restricted, progsmod_no_build_in,
desc:
Ryuvian vessels have unique energy systems.

Increases 0-flux boost speed by %s/%s/%s/%s and allows the zero-flux engine boost to take effect regardless of flux level.

However, it also prevents the use of active venting.
short: Increases 0-flux boost speed by %s/%s/%s/%s and allows it to take effect regardless of flux level. Prevents the use of active venting.

name: Ryuvian Engineering
tags: special, engines, defensive, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, restricted, progsmod_no_build_in,
desc:
Nobody but Ryuvians are worthy of this technology.

Increases weapons durability by %s and engines durability by %s.
short: Increases weapons durability by %s and engines durability by %s.

name: Short Range Warp
tags: special, offensive, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, restricted, progsmod_no_build_in,
desc:
The Sunrider's ultra accurate warp system can be used even on ground invasions, such as the barely successful Wedding Crash. Besides, without this, the Sunrider would cause you to be always identified regardless of transponder.

Increases the effective strength of planetary raids by %s, up to the total number of marines in the fleet and lowers sensor profile by %s.
short: Increases the effective strength of planetary raids by %s, up to the total number of marines in the fleet.

name: Advanced Ceran Engineering
tags: special, engines, defensive, shields, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, restricted, progsmod_no_build_in,
desc:
The Sunrider was built with the most modern technologies available at Cera when she was developed, but with upgrades provided by Chigara Lynn Ashada and the Solar Alliance, she became even more modern. Her interior is also luxurious, giving her more combat readiness than normal, but also making her require more supplies to keep.

Increases maximum combat readiness by %s, ECM rate by %s, shield unfold and turn rate by %s, and flux dissipation rate, including additional vents by %s.

However, it also increases monthly supply upkeep by %s, reduces 0-flux top speed by %s and prevents the use of active venting. 
If another hullmod increases 0-flux top speed by a flat amount, said buff is also affected.
short:
Increases ECM rate by %s, and shield unfold and turn rate by %s.

Prevents the use of active venting and reduces 0-flux top speed by %s.

name: Sick Bay
desc:
The Sunrider hosts a special infirmary that can recover injuries of her crew members faster, and often prevent death.

Reduces crew casualities from hull damage and fighter losses by %s.
short: Reduces crew casualities from hull damage and fighter losses by %s.

name: Fallen Outsider
desc:
These ships that mysteriously came from an unknown place are built differently.

Energy damage to shields reduced by %s.
Damage taken by solar coronas and hyperspace storms reduced by %s.
Active venting rate increased by %s.

Overload duration increased by %s.
Monthly supply upkeep increased by %s.

name: Ryder Resilience
desc:
Weapon and engine durability increased by %s.
Weapon and engine repair speed by %s.
